articles.title: About this site
articles.description:
Welcome to the *Self-Authoring *blog.

I am excited and inspired by what the future holds in the brave new world of the information-driven  age.

I am hoping that *Self Authoring* will attract other voices around the Youth community.please email your thought through  ideas to <mosesgikings@gmail.com>.

I welcome comments from all readers and encourage discussion.

articles.title: SELF AUTHORING
articles.description: Welcome to the website.Exploring  I hope you enjoy it!
